name: Bolt (itch)
description:
*Read Me*
Even though the game loads up, it takes a little bit of time before you can click either "Play" or "Instructions", roughly 1 minute.
To begin playing a level, simply click the title of each level, i.e. Level 1, Level 2...
*Read Me*

This is my Web Games Development game made with Construct 2 engine. Due to having a event limit with the free version, I'm unable to upload the final sixth level.
I am not taking any donations or requests, just enjoy the short cut version.
